duties_responsibilities.duty: Weld and fabricate industrial pipes and assist pipe fitters in installation.
Select equipment, plan layouts, and apply welding techniques.
Identify safety risks and requirements for welding job processes.
Assist fitters, rigging, and have knowledge of process piping.
Bolt, clamp, and tack-weld parts to secure in position for welding.
Identify all equipment and metal materials, as well as the appropriate welding procedure for various equipment and metal types involved.

education_certification.credential: Current applicable welding certification with Zachry or equivalent
